# Modals of Possibility and Probability

**Rule**  Express different degrees of certainty. *Must* ≈ 90%, *may* ≈ 50 %, *might/could* ≈ 30 %.

**Example (TV weather forecast – video)**

{{< video src="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1APwq1df6Mw" title="The Weather Channel forecast clip" width=640 height=360 >}}

*“It **might** rain tonight, so keep an umbrella handy.”*
